Cast      Aamir Khan           Rani Mukerji   
          Kareena Kapoor       Om Prakash     
          Nawazuddin Siddiqui  Subrat Dutta   
          Sachin Patil         Shernaz Patel  
                                              
                                              
                                              
     Director    :   Reema Kagti              
     Writer      :   Zoya Akhtar              
                                              
     Genre       :   Crime | Drama | Thriller 
                                              
                                              
                                              
  Seeing reflections of Mumbai under the red  
  light, Talaash is a tale of love lost,      
  fatal attraction and above all the quest    
  to solve a perfect crime. Suspense at its   
  core, Talaash explores Mumbai's underbelly  
  like never before.                          
  Aamir Khan plays an investigation officer,  
  who receives a phone call early in the      
  morning informing him about death and an    
  accident and how everything starts to unfold
  from there. What looks like a simple car    
  accident investigation turns into a haunting
  mystery as further investigations show many 
  anomalies were stringed to the death        
  of the victim.
